title: Ben 10 - Episode 1: And Then There Were 10
description: Ben discovers the Omnitrix and transforms into a hero for the first time.

title: Chhota Bheem - Episode 1: The Magical Dholakpur
description: Bheem and his friends face off against a mysterious magician in Dholakpur.

title: Jackie Chan Adventures - Episode 1: The Dark Hand
description: Jackie and Jade discover the power of the Talismans while being chased by The Dark Hand.

title: Doraemon - Episode 1: Nobita’s Dinosaur Adventure
description: Nobita uses Doraemon’s time machine to bring a baby dinosaur to the future.

title: Shinchan - Episode 1: Trouble at the Mall
description: Shinchan creates chaos at a local shopping mall while his parents try to shop.

title: Pokemon - Episode 1: I Choose You!
description: Ash Ketchum begins his journey as a Pokémon trainer and meets Pikachu.

title: Motu Patlu - Episode 1: Welcome to Furfuri Nagar
description: Motu and Patlu’s silly antics cause hilarious trouble in their hometown.

title: Tom and Jerry - Episode 1: The Cat Concerto
description: Jerry interrupts Tom’s piano concert in a classic chase sequence.

title: Oggy and the Cockroaches - Episode 1: French Fries Mayhem
description: Oggy’s lunch is ruined by Dee Dee and the gang as chaos unfolds.

title: Dragon Ball Z - Episode 1: The Arrival of Raditz
description: Goku learns shocking truths as his brother Raditz arrives on Earth.
